member.summary: The base class for all IPointCloudAccess implementations in this sample.

member.summary: Constructs a new instance of the base class.

member.summary: Adds a new cell to the point cloud.
member.param: True to randomize point number and location, false for a regular arrangement of points.

member.name: M:Revit.SDK.Samples.CS.PointCloudEngine.PointCloudAccessBase.AddCell(Autodesk.Revit.DB.XYZ,Autodesk.Revit.DB.XYZ,System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds a new cell to the point cloud.

member.name: M:Revit.SDK.Samples.CS.PointCloudEngine.PointCloudAccessBase.AddCellToOutline(Revit.SDK.Samples.CS.PointCloudEngine.PointCloudCellStorage)
member.summary: Adds a cell to the stored outline of the point cloud. If the cell boundaries extend beyond the current outline, the outline is adjusted.

member.name: M:Revit.SDK.Samples.CS.PointCloudEngine.PointCloudAccessBase.GetOutline
member.summary: Gets the outline calculated from all cells in the point cloud.

member.name: M:Revit.SDK.Samples.CS.PointCloudEngine.PointCloudAccessBase.GetScale
member.summary: Gets the scale stored for this point cloud.

member.name: M:Revit.SDK.Samples.CS.PointCloudEngine.PointCloudAccessBase.SerializeObjectData(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Saves the contents of the point cloud into an XML element.
member.param: The XML element in which to save the point cloud properties.

member.name: M:Revit.SDK.Samples.CS.PointCloudEngine.PointCloudAccessBase.ReadSomePoints(Autodesk.Revit.DB.PointClouds.PointCloudFilter,System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: The internal implementation for point cloud read requests from Revit.
member.remarks: Both IPointCloudAccess.ReadPoints() and IPointSetIterator.ReadPoints() are served by this method.
member.param: The maximum number of points in the buffer.

The start index for points. Pass 0 if called from IPointCloudAccess.ReadPoints() or if this is the first call to IPointSetIterator.ReadPoints(). Pass the previous cumulative number of read points for second and successive calls to IPointSetIterator.ReadPoints().

member.name: M:Revit.SDK.Samples.CS.PointCloudEngine.PointCloudAccessBase.SetupFrom(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Sets up a point cloud from an XML root element.

member.name: T:Revit.SDK.Samples.CS.PointCloudEngine.PointCloudEngineType
member.summary: The type of engine.
member.remarks: Because the same engine implementation is used for all types of engines in this sample, a member of this enumerated type is used to determine the logic necessary to create the IPointCloudAccess instance.

member.name: F:Revit.SDK.Samples.CS.PointCloudEngine.PointCloudEngineType.Predefined
member.summary: A predefined point cloud engine (non-randomized).

member.name: F:Revit.SDK.Samples.CS.PointCloudEngine.PointCloudEngineType.RandomizedPoints
member.summary: A predefined point cloud engine (randomized).

member.name: F:Revit.SDK.Samples.CS.PointCloudEngine.PointCloudEngineType.FileBased
member.summary: A file based point cloud engine.

member.summary: An implementation of IPointCloudEngine used by all the custom engines in this sample.

member.name: T:Revit.SDK.Samples.CS.PointCloudEngine.FileBasedPointCloud
member.summary: An implementation for a file-based point cloud.
member.example:
The file format is based upon XML. A sample XML looks like:
The scale value applies to the entire point cloud. One or more cell values should be supplied, with the coordinates of the opposing corners, a color, and an option whether or not to randomize the generated points.

member.name: T:Revit.SDK.Samples.CS.PointCloudEngine.PointCloudCellStorage
member.summary: This class is used to calculate and store points for a given cell.

member.name: M:Revit.SDK.Samples.CS.PointCloudEngine.PointCloudCellStorage.#ctor(Autodesk.Revit.DB.XYZ,Autodesk.Revit.DB.XYZ,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of a rectangular cell.
member.param: The lower left point of the cell.
The upper right point of the cell.
The color used for points in the cell.
True to apply randomization to the number and location of points, false for a regular arrangement of points.

member.name: M:Revit.SDK.Samples.CS.PointCloudEngine.PointCloudCellStorage.GeneratePoints
member.summary: Invokes the calculation for all points in the cell.

member.summary: Serializes the properties of the cell to an XML element.
member.param: The element to which the properties are added as subelements.

member.name: M:Revit.SDK.Samples.CS.PointCloudEngine.PointCloudCellStorage.#ctor(System.Xml.Linq.XElement)
member.summary: Constructs a new instance of a rectangular cell from an XML element.
member.param: The XML element representing the cell.

member.summary: The number of points in the cell.

member.summary: The lower left point of the cell.
